trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> objects in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> em um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> classe é usada para armazenar e gerenciar uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objetos em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle.

trans-unit.source: Each row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada linha em uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle é representado por um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control stores all of its data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle armazena todas as suas linhas de dados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> class supports several ways to access the items in the collection:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> classe oferece suporte a várias maneiras de acessar os itens na coleção:

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Item%2A> indexer to directly retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Item%2A> indexador para recuperar diretamente um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objeto em um índice com base em zero específico.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to retrieve an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> método para recuperar um enumerador que pode ser usado para iterar pela coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the items in the collection into an <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> object, which can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.CopyTo%2A> método para copiar os itens na coleção em uma <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> objeto, que pode ser usado para acessar os itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: To determine the total number of items in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> property
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o número total de itens na coleção, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> propriedade

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and display the values of a column on the page.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como percorrer o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> coleção de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controlar e exibir os valores de uma coluna na página.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> objects with which to initialize the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> que contém os objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> com os quais inicializar a coleção.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> usando o objeto <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> class using the specified <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType> object.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> classe usando especificado <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType> object should contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects with which to populate the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType> objeto deve conter o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objetos com o qual preencher a coleção.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object that receives the copied items from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Array" /> baseado em zero que recebe os itens copiados do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The first index in the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro índice no objeto <see cref="T:System.Array" /> especificado para receber os conteúdos copiados.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object, starting at the specified index in the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Copia os itens desse <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> para o objeto <see cref="T:System.Array" /> especificado, começando no índice especificado no objeto <see cref="T:System.Array" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> object, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para copiar os itens a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> objeto especificado <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> objeto, iniciando no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> object can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> objeto, em seguida, pode ser usado para acessar os itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: You must use a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> object for the `array` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar um com base em zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> de objeto para o `array` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the items of collection into an array.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.CopyTo%2A> método para copiar os itens da coleção em uma matriz.

trans-unit.source: The array is iterated through and the values of the first cell are displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: A matriz é iteração e os valores da primeira célula são exibidos na página.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de itens no objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O número de itens no objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> property to determine the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> para determinar o número de itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> propriedade normalmente é usada quando a iteração na coleção para determinar o superior associado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> property is also commonly used to determine whether a collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> propriedade também costuma ser usada para determinar se uma coleção está vazia.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control contains any records.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.Count%2A> propriedade para determinar se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle contém os registros.

trans-unit.source: A value greater than zero indicates that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control contains at least one record.
trans-unit.target: Um valor maior que zero indica que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle contém pelo menos um registro.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that contains all <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um enumerador que contém todos os objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> no <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> implemented object that contains all <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto implementado por <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> que contém todos os objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> na <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to get an enumerator that can be iterated through linearly to access each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para obter um enumerador que pode ser iterado por meio de linearmente para acessar cada item de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection>.

trans-unit.source: To access the item at the current position in the enumerator, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar o item na posição atual do enumerador, use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para mover para o próximo item na coleção.

trans-unit.source: To move the enumerator to its initial position, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Para mover o enumerador como sua posição inicial, use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: When you initially get the enumerator or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando você inicialmente obter o enumerador ou usar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para mover o enumerador para o primeiro item na coleção, você deve chamar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item that is represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o item que é representado pelo <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade está definida.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to retrieve an enumerator that contains the values from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> método para recuperar um enumerador que contém os valores da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is iterated through and the values of the first cell are displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: O enumerador é iterado por meio e os valores da primeira célula são exibidos na página.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the rows in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> object can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as linhas no objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> podem ser modificadas.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> propriedade para determinar se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objetos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> objeto pode ser modificado.

trans-unit.source: This property has been overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object can be modified in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade foi substituída para sempre retornar `false` para indicar que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objetos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> objeto pode ser modificado em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> object is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection" /> é sincronizado (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object is thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> propriedade para determinar se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> objeto é thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: This property has been overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object is not thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade foi substituída para sempre retornar `false` para indicar que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> objeto não é thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> propriedade, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> a ser recuperado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow" /> no índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object from the collection at the specified index, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: Use este indexador para recuperar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objeto da coleção no índice especificado, usando a notação de matriz.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o indexador para recuperar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objeto da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The values of the cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object are displayed on the page.
trans-unit.target: Os valores das células de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> objeto são exibidos na página.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property to get an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.SyncRoot%2A> propriedade para obter um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> object itself.
trans-unit.target: O objeto retornado nesta implementação é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> objeto propriamente dito.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection.SyncRoot%2A> propriedade, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object that is the destination of the elements copied from the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensional que é o destino dos elementos copiados da interface <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: A matriz deve ter indexação com base em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in a <see cref="T:System.Array" /> object at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero em um objeto <see cref="T:System.Array" /> no qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <see cref="M:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowCollection> instância é convertida para o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
